AGH University of Science and Technology: AGH University of Krakow, (abbreviated as AGH University; formerly: AGH University of Science and Technology, in short AGH UST) is a public university in Krak√≥w, Poland.[5] Founded in 1913,[6] its inauguration took place in 1919.[7] The university focuses on innovative technologies, its research profile also includes engineering disciplines, exact sciences, Earth sciences, and social sciences.
